## ListDisplay variable

High-level component that renders the entire ListDisplay experience using the core hook for state management and a set of slot-based components for the UI. Consumers can override any slot via the [ListConfig.components](./list-display.listconfig.components.md) map while still benefiting from the built-in behaviours.

**Signature:**

```typescript
ListDisplay: React.FC<ListDisplayProps>
```
